channel.title: Getting stuck on objects
channel.description: Little tiny sticky out bits on walls in narrow sections stopped my progress, I had to use strafe to navigate past them. Happens in numerous places on numerous maps especially the train ride into the complex at the very begining its like the pathways are too narrow in some places.

item.title: Getting stuck on objects
item.dc:creator: keefy
item.description:
Little tiny sticky out bits on walls in narrow sections stopped my progress, I had to use strafe to navigate past them.
Happens in numerous places on numerous maps especially the train ride into the complex at the very begining its like the pathways are too narrow in some places.
